__e: Did you seek my authority before tasking my platoon with this?
Maybe by watching my toons, you'll learn something and I can trade you easier.
Second Platoon, Baker Company ready, sir. Okay. Thank you.

I said where's the rest of your platoon, Sergeant Steiner!
The rest of the squad are reported KIA.
Shit, everybody in this platoon is a hard charger.
Does it matter? I heard it's 'cause this squad's so bad he was afraid you'd get him killed when the 5th Wave hits.
I think you're forgetting about one very important 13th member of our squad.
Ours ain't the only platoon that ain't shooting straight.
